rivet_compression_comparison.png.description: Comparison diagram showing rivet cross-sections before and after compression, illustrating rivet head formation in structural connections

bolted_connection_schematic.png.description: Simple schematic of bolted connection showing two structural members joined by bolts in cross-section view

rivet_bolt_load_transfer_comparison.png.description: Comparison of rivet and bolt load transfer mechanisms showing cross-sectional views with force arrows indicating shear transfer

panel_stringer_junction_configurations.p.description: Longitudinal junction diagrams showing panel-stringer connections with rivets in different configurations

discrete_to_continuous_junction_idealiza.description: Idealization of discrete junction showing transformation from inherently discrete connection to continuous junction line representation

stringer_panel_junction_force_analysis.p.description: Stringer-panel junction analysis showing force flow distribution and idealized junction representation with force vectors

rivet_pitch_force_distribution.png.description: Detailed diagram of riveted connection showing pitch, length, and force distribution along junction element

panel_connection_rivet_rows_analysis.png.description: Panel-panel connection analysis with one and two rows of rivets showing shear flow distribution and equilibrium conditions

force_based_junction_compatibility.png.description: Force-based approach diagram showing panel junction with distributed forces and compatibility conditions using PCVW theorem

structure_repeating_unit_strain_energy.p.description: Structural diagram showing full structure with rivets and repeating unit element for strain energy analysis

rivet_deformation_comparison.png.description: Rivet deformability comparison showing undeformed and deformed rivet states under shear force

panel_rivet_strain_energy_system.png.description: Panel-rivet system showing strain energy contributions from panels and rivets with force distributions

uneven_shear_flow_distribution.png.description: Simple beam diagram showing uneven shear flow distribution between two rivers when panel thicknesses differ

three_row_rivet_connection_symmetry.png.description: Panel-panel connection with three rows of rivets showing schematic representation and force distribution from symmetry analysis

three_row_equilibrium_conditions.png.description: Equilibrium conditions diagram for three-row rivet junction showing force balance and compatibility equations

shear_flow_alpha_zero_case.png.description: Results diagram showing shear flow distribution for extreme case where alpha approaches zero with force values at three locations

bonding_vs_riveting_load_transfer.png.description: Bonding technique diagrams showing continuous load transfer in bonded junction versus discrete load transfer in riveted junction

differential_bonded_junction_analysis.pn.description: Differential bonded junction problem showing shear flow functions as continuous functions of position with equilibrium equation

panel_glue_differential_element_analysis.description: Detailed free body diagrams of upper panel, glue layer, and lower panel showing differential element analysis with shear flows

bonded_junction_menabrea_theorem.png.description: Bonded junction cross-section showing panels and glue layer with coordinate system for applying Menabrea's theorem

boundary_conditions_differential_problem.description: Boundary condition diagram showing beam with applied load and coordinate system for differential problem solution

solution_shear_distribution_graph.png.description: Graphical representation of solution showing shear flow and shear stress distributions across bonded junction with parameter alpha effects
